zoomed out 2x=40000000

Laser Hockey

Play Until XX Points [James0x57]
042013A4 2C0000XX
Default is 08

Mission Jump [James0x57]
0424AEB0 38840001
28371D28 00000800
0424AEB0 388000XX
E0000000 80008000
Hold A right after clearing a mission to load Mission XX (00-63 hex).

Infinite Lifes [James0x57]
04254590 38800057

Unlimited Tank Fire [James0x57]
04245CD0 38000000

Tank Fire Type and Ricochet Count [James0x57]
04245D28 390000XX
00-0F is normal, number of times it will ricochet
10-1F is rocket; 10 is no ricochet, 1F is max
20-2F is rocket, dark smoke; 20 is no ricochet, 2F is max
30-3F is same as 20-2F; 30 is no ricochet, 3F is max

Missiles Are Fast [James0x57]
04245D24 C03D0018

Tanks Are Fast [James0x57]
04245FD0 C01C0018
Just to note, normal tank speed is C01C0014

Can lay 16 Mines [James0x57]
04245BC4 38A00010

Shooting Range

043A2BD8 00000000

DE000000 90009380
14000004 00000XXX
E0000000 80008000
999 (0x3E7) is max score.

999 (0x3E7) is max score.

Universal Codes for Wii Play

Master Button Activator [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
B0030114 7FA3EB78
D2000014 00000002
3D808000 900C1550
90030000 00000000
E0000000 80008000

Button Activator [Bully@Wiiplaza]
28001552 YYYYZZZZ
*Requires "Master Button Activator"*

All Minigames

Highscore Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
809A000C 7F63DB78
F400001C 02A41B02
3880XXXX 909E0010
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*XXXX = Hex*

Tanks!

Tank Teleporter [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
54C0103A C0050008
D2000004 00000009
3D808000 3D408000
614A1552 A14A0000
7149VVVV 41820014
81650000 916C1650
81650008 916C1654
7149WWWW 41820014
816C1650 91650000
816C1654 91650008
C0050008 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*Requires "Master Button Activator"*
*VVVV = Save coordinates*
*WWWW = Teleport to saved position*

Bonus Tanks Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
38000005 901F0038
14000028 38A0XXXX
E0000000 80008000
*XXXX = Hex*
*0001 = Default*

Starting Mission Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
9BDD0021 9BDD0022
D200001C 00000002
3BC000XX 93DD0008
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*XX = Mission to play minus 1 converted to Hex*
*There are 100 missions in total*
*Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bTglCrnGxHE

Tank Fire Type and Ricochet Count [Y.S.]
F6000001 80008040
C03D002C 811D0028
14000004 390000XX
E0000000 80008000
Hacked by James 0x57 for NTSC-US, converted into Universal code by Y.S.
00-0F is normal, number of times it will ricochet
10-1F is rocket; 10 is no ricochet, 1F is max
20-2F is rocket, dark smoke; 20 is no ricochet, 2F is max
30-3F is same as 20-2F; 30 is no ricochet, 3F is max

Can lay 16 mines [Y.S.]
F6000001 80008040
57E0103A 80BD0038
14000004 38A00010
E0000000 80008000
Hacked by James 0x57 for NTSC-US, converted into Universal code by Y.S.
